00059 /* default fonts to load/initalize */
00060 /* first font is the default (index 0), others optional */
00061 typedef struct uiFont {
00062     struct uiFont *next, *prev;
00063     char filename[1024];/* 1024 = FILE_MAX */
00064     short blf_id;       /* from blfont lib */
00065     short uifont_id;    /* own id */
00066     short r_to_l;       /* fonts that read from left to right */
00067     short pad;
00068     
00069 } uiFont;
00070 
00071 /* this state defines appearance of text */
00072 typedef struct uiFontStyle {
00073     short uifont_id;        /* saved in file, 0 is default */
00074     short points;           /* actual size depends on 'global' dpi */
00075     short kerning;          /* unfitted or default kerning value. */
00076     char pad[6];
00077     short italic, bold;     /* style hint */
00078     short shadow;           /* value is amount of pixels blur */
00079     short shadx, shady;     /* shadow offset in pixels */
00080     short align;            /* text align hint */
00081     float shadowalpha;      /* total alpha */
00082     float shadowcolor;      /* 1 value, typically white or black anyway */
00083     
00084 } uiFontStyle;
00085 
00086 /* uiFontStyle->align */
00087 #define UI_STYLE_TEXT_LEFT      0
00088 #define UI_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER    1
00089 #define UI_STYLE_TEXT_RIGHT     2
00090

00440 #define USER_SECTION_INPUT      5

00443 /* flag */
00444 #define USER_AUTOSAVE           (1 << 0)
00445 /*#define USER_AUTOGRABGRID     (1 << 1)    deprecated */
00446 /*#define USER_AUTOROTGRID      (1 << 2)    deprecated */
00447 /*#define USER_AUTOSIZEGRID     (1 << 3)    deprecated */
00448 #define USER_SCENEGLOBAL        (1 << 4)
00449 #define USER_TRACKBALL          (1 << 5)
00450 /*#define USER_DUPLILINK        (1 << 6)    deprecated */
00451 /*#define USER_FSCOLLUM         (1 << 7)    deprecated */
00452 #define USER_MAT_ON_OB          (1 << 8)
00453 /*#define USER_NO_CAPSLOCK      (1 << 9)*/ /* not used anywhere */
00454 /*#define USER_VIEWMOVE         (1 << 10)*/ /* not used anywhere */
00455 #define USER_TOOLTIPS           (1 << 11)
00456 #define USER_TWOBUTTONMOUSE     (1 << 12)
00457 #define USER_NONUMPAD           (1 << 13)
00458 #define USER_LMOUSESELECT       (1 << 14)
00459 #define USER_FILECOMPRESS       (1 << 15)
00460 #define USER_SAVE_PREVIEWS      (1 << 16)
00461 #define USER_CUSTOM_RANGE       (1 << 17)
00462 #define USER_ADD_EDITMODE       (1 << 18)
00463 #define USER_ADD_VIEWALIGNED    (1 << 19)
00464 #define USER_RELPATHS           (1 << 20)
00465 #define USER_RELEASECONFIRM     (1 << 21)
00466 #define USER_SCRIPT_AUTOEXEC_DISABLE    (1 << 22)
00467 #define USER_FILENOUI           (1 << 23)
00468 #define USER_NONEGFRAMES        (1 << 24)
00469 #define USER_TXT_TABSTOSPACES_DISABLE   (1 << 25)
00470 #define USER_TOOLTIPS_PYTHON    (1 << 26)
00471 
00472 /* helper macro for checking frame clamping */
00473 #define FRAMENUMBER_MIN_CLAMP(cfra)                                           \
00474     {                                                                         \
00475         if ((U.flag & USER_NONEGFRAMES) && (cfra < 0))                        \
00476             cfra = 0;                                                         \
00477     }

00518 /* Auto-Keying mode */
00519     /* AUTOKEY_ON is a bitflag */
00520 #define     AUTOKEY_ON              1
00521     /* AUTOKEY_ON + 2**n...  (i.e. AUTOKEY_MODE_NORMAL = AUTOKEY_ON + 2) to preserve setting, even when autokey turned off  */
00522 #define     AUTOKEY_MODE_NORMAL     3
00523 #define     AUTOKEY_MODE_EDITKEYS   5
00524 
00525 /* Auto-Keying flag
00526  * U.autokey_flag (not strictly used when autokeying only - is also used when keyframing these days)
00527  * note: AUTOKEY_FLAG_* is used with a macro, search for lines like IS_AUTOKEY_FLAG(INSERTAVAIL)
00528  */
00529 #define     AUTOKEY_FLAG_INSERTAVAIL    (1<<0)
00530 #define     AUTOKEY_FLAG_INSERTNEEDED   (1<<1)
00531 #define     AUTOKEY_FLAG_AUTOMATKEY     (1<<2)
00532 #define     AUTOKEY_FLAG_XYZ2RGB        (1<<3)
00533

00535 #define     AUTOKEY_FLAG_ONLYKEYINGSET  (1<<6)
00536 #define     ANIMRECORD_FLAG_WITHNLA     (1<<10)

00592 /* timecode display styles */
00593     /* as little info as is necessary to show relevant info
00594      * with '+' to denote the frames 
00595      * i.e. HH:MM:SS+FF, MM:SS+FF, SS+FF, or MM:SS
00596      */
00597 #define USER_TIMECODE_MINIMAL       0
00598     /* reduced SMPTE - (HH:)MM:SS:FF */
00599 #define USER_TIMECODE_SMPTE_MSF     1
00600     /* full SMPTE - HH:MM:SS:FF */
00601 #define USER_TIMECODE_SMPTE_FULL    2
00602     /* milliseconds for sub-frames - HH:MM:SS.sss */
00603 #define USER_TIMECODE_MILLISECONDS  3
00604     /* seconds only */
00605 #define USER_TIMECODE_SECONDS_ONLY  4
00606 
00607 /* theme drawtypes */
00608 #define TH_MINIMAL      0
00609 #define TH_ROUNDSHADED  1
00610 #define TH_ROUNDED      2
00611 #define TH_OLDSKOOL     3
00612 #define TH_SHADED       4
00613 
00614 /* ndof_flag (3D mouse options) */
00615 #define NDOF_SHOW_GUIDE     (1 << 0)
00616 #define NDOF_FLY_HELICOPTER (1 << 1)
00617 #define NDOF_LOCK_HORIZON   (1 << 2)
00618 /* the following might not need to be saved between sessions,
00619  * but they do need to live somewhere accessible... */
00620 #define NDOF_SHOULD_PAN     (1 << 3)
00621 #define NDOF_SHOULD_ZOOM    (1 << 4)
00622 #define NDOF_SHOULD_ROTATE  (1 << 5)
00623 /* orbit navigation modes
00624  * only two options, so it's sort of a hybrid bool/enum
00625  * if ((U.ndof_flag & NDOF_ORBIT_MODE) == NDOF_OM_OBJECT)... */
00626 
00627 // #define NDOF_ORBIT_MODE     (1 << 6)
00628 // #define NDOF_OM_TARGETCAMERA 0
00629 // #define NDOF_OM_OBJECT      NDOF_ORBIT_MODE
00630 
00631 /* actually... users probably don't care about what the mode
00632  * is called, just that it feels right */
00633 /* zoom is up/down if this flag is set (otherwise forward/backward) */
00634 #define NDOF_ZOOM_UPDOWN (1 << 7)
00635 #define NDOF_ZOOM_INVERT (1 << 8)
00636 #define NDOF_ROTATE_INVERT_AXIS (1 << 9)
00637 #define NDOF_TILT_INVERT_AXIS (1 << 10)
00638 #define NDOF_ROLL_INVERT_AXIS (1 << 11)
00639 #define NDOF_PANX_INVERT_AXIS (1 << 12)
00640 #define NDOF_PANY_INVERT_AXIS (1 << 13)
00641 #define NDOF_PANZ_INVERT_AXIS (1 << 14)
00642 
00643 /* compute_device_type */
00644 #define USER_COMPUTE_DEVICE_NONE    0
00645 #define USER_COMPUTE_DEVICE_OPENCL  1
00646 #define USER_COMPUTE_DEVICE_CUDA    2
